product_name: Eagle Creek Nelly Daypack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for a day of traveling or running errands, the Eagle Creek Nelly features a roomy main compartment and smart organizing pockets to keep your electronics and everything else within easy reach. Roomy main zip compartment; interior has mobile phone and additional organizer pockets; padded, zippered compartment is sized to fit most e-readers, netbooks or iPad. Quick-access exterior pockets: 1 secures with a magnetic closure and 2 are stretch drop-ins. Nelly is made from a tough, yet durable recycled polyester and features comfortable, adjustable shoulder straps. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for a day of traveling or running errands, the Eagle Creek Nelly features a roomy main compartment and smart organizing pockets to keep your electronics and everything else within easy reach.
